article:
Do you sometimes try something new and expect to be successful for the first time? Are you angry with  _  if you aren't?
Do you know a baby how to learn to walk? When a baby falls, the loving parent  _  him, "That's OK. Try again." Can you imagine if after many falls, the parent  picks up  the baby and says, "Well, I guess you'll  _  be good at walking." and doesn't let the child continue to try?
Remember the first time you  fell off  your bike? I do. I didn't lose my  _ . I went back and tried again. Didn't you?
"When I was a kid," my dad told me, "you know, I  _  4 UP , but it wasn't very good. I went back to the lab and  started with  5 UP and still, it wasn't right.  _  I tried 6 UP, but it didn't succeed. So I stopped. If I went on  trying , may be 7 UP would be the hit!" Time after time, he said, he  gave up  too soon. He told me, "If I had tried one more, I could have been a rich man."
Thomas Edison  _  over a thousand  _  before he found the filament(n.) material that would make an electric light bulb shine.
 _  we try something new, we need practice. No matter how well we plan, there are times unexpected problems developing.
Failure is  _  not an option . It is a chance only for those who try.
